name: dxb
description: A set of utility for sfdx
author: David Browaeys

dxb.description: A cli plugin for the Salesforce CLI built by David Browaeys containing a lot of helpful commands.

dxb:object.description: A set of commands in regards to salesforce objects.

dxb:object:fields.description: A set of commands in regards to salesforce fields.

dxb:mdapi.description: A set of commands that extends dx mdapi topic.

dxb:data.description: A set of commands that allows to manipulate and optimize data.

dxb:delta.description: A set of commands in regards to delta package generator.

dxb:profile.description: A set of commands that allow to manipuilate and faciliate salesforce profiles.

dxb:object:vr.description: A set of commands in regards to validation rule

dxb:static.description: A set of commands in regards to static resource

scripts.prepack: rm -rf lib && tsc -b && oclif-dev manifest && oclif-dev readme
